name: StLouisEncephalitisVirusInfectionTestsForSaintLouisEncephalitisVirusAntibodyQualitative
title: St. Louis Encephalitis Virus Infection (Tests for Saint Louis encephalitis virus Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of St. Louis Encephalitis Virus Antibody (qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: St. Louis Encephalitis Virus Antibody;  

LOINC Search terms: ‘Saint Louis Encephalitis Virus Ab -Qn -(culture OR isolation OR interpretation)’),(Exclusion Criteria: Quantitative tests)
